mapper.insert: insert into DS_CMS_CATEGORY (PID, SITEID, NAME, SCOPE, STATUS, URL, SEQ, VIEWSITE, PAGEVIEWSITE, MVIEWSITE, MPAGEVIEWSITE, METAKEYWORDS, METADESCRIPTION, SUMMARY, RELEASETIME, RELEASESOURCE, RELEASEUSER, IMG, CONTENT) values (null#{pid}, #{siteid}, #{name}, #{scope}, #{status}, #{url}, #{seq}, #{viewsite}, #{pageviewsite}, #{mviewsite}, #{mpageviewsite}, #{metakeywords}, #{metadescription}, #{summary}, #{releasetime}, #{releasesource}, #{releaseuser}, #{img}, #{content})
mapper.update: update DS_CMS_CATEGORY set PID=null#{pid}, NAME=#{name}, URL=#{url}, VIEWSITE=#{viewsite}, PAGEVIEWSITE=#{pageviewsite}, MVIEWSITE=#{mviewsite}, MPAGEVIEWSITE=#{mpageviewsite} where ID=#{id}
update DS_CMS_CATEGORY set SCOPE=#{scope} where ID=#{id}
update DS_CMS_CATEGORY set SEQ=#{seq} where ID=#{id} and SITEID=#{siteid}

update DS_CMS_CATEGORY set METAKEYWORDS=#{metakeywords}, METADESCRIPTION=#{metadescription}, SUMMARY=#{summary}, RELEASETIME=#{releasetime}, RELEASESOURCE=#{releasesource}, RELEASEUSER=#{releaseuser}, IMG=#{img}, STATUS=#{status}, CONTENT=#{content} where ID=#{id} and SITEID=#{siteid}
update DS_CMS_CATEGORY set URL=#{url}, SUMMARY=#{summary}, RELEASETIME=#{releasetime}, IMG=#{img}, STATUS=#{status} where ID=#{id} and SITEID=#{siteid} and SCOPE=2
update DS_CMS_CATEGORY set STATUS=#{status} where ID=#{id}
mapper.sql: ID, PID, SITEID, NAME, SCOPE, STATUS, URL, SEQ, VIEWSITE, PAGEVIEWSITE, MVIEWSITE, MPAGEVIEWSITE, METAKEYWORDS, METADESCRIPTION, SUMMARY, RELEASETIME, RELEASESOURCE, RELEASEUSER, IMG, CONTENT
mapper.select: select from DS_CMS_CATEGORY order by SEQ, ID
